title: 9: Swearing in Foreign Languages
itunes:title: 9: Swearing in Foreign Languages
itunes:subtitle: We learn about swearing in German, Dutch, Brazilian Portuguese, Farci, and Tamil. Linguistic Anthropologist Evelyn Dean-Olmstead helps us make the connection between taboo and the culture that created it.
description:
We learn about swearing in German, Dutch, Brazilian Portuguese, Farci, and Tamil. Linguistic Anthropologist Evelyn Dean-Olmstead helps us make the connection between taboo and the culture that created it.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
